Detailed Description

template<class F, class Covar, class Disambiguate = void>
struct vpdt_update_covariance< F, Covar, Disambiguate >

Specialized classes to update covariance of different types.

Note:
the Disambiguate template parameter is a dummy used to prevent ambiguous instantiations
